Name: United States
Description: A country in North America, known for its diverse culture, technology, and economic power.

Name: Canada
Description: A country in North America, known for its natural beauty, diverse culture, and high quality of life.

Name: Mexico
Description: A country in southern North America, known for its rich culture, history, and vibrant cities.

Name: Guatemala
Description: Central American country known for its Mayan ruins, volcanoes, and rich indigenous culture.

Name: Honduras
Description: A country in Central America known for its ancient Mayan ruins and rich biodiversity.

Name: El Salvador
Description: The smallest country in Central America, known for its volcanic landscapes and rich history.

Name: Nicaragua
Description: A country in Central America, known for its lakes, volcanoes, and diverse wildlife.

Name: Costa Rica
Description: A country in Central America, known for its biodiversity, natural beauty, and high standard of living.

Name: Panama
Description: A country in Central America, famous for the Panama Canal and its diverse cultural heritage.

Name: Cuba
Description: An island nation in the Caribbean, known for its historical significance, vibrant culture, and beautiful beaches.

Name: Jamaica
Description: An island nation in the Caribbean, known for its reggae music, beautiful beaches, and rich culture.

Name: Haiti
Description: A country on the island of Hispaniola, known for its historical importance and vibrant culture.

Name: Dominican Republic
Description: A country on the island of Hispaniola, known for its beautiful beaches, resorts, and rich history.

Name: Belize
Description: A small Central American country, known for its coastline, Mayan ruins, and rich biodiversity.
